Prashanth TR

  • Prashanth TR
  • prashanth.thattai@gmail.com

A researcher, musician, philosopher. My research began with curiosity about the connection between computers and music. In the recent years, my interests have shifted the development of software systems that transcend their use as tools to become computational partners in their social interaction with humans.
